jd: Hi Greetings from NAM Info Inc!!! Please find the below immediate requirements from my client. Position: AWS Databricks Architect Location: Hybrid-Bostan-MA Duration: 12 Months Contract Description Lead development team for ongoing data and analytics enhancements and development projects. Will be primary developer, including both developing directly but also coordinating with offshore developers, including both core dev/support team, but also additional developers for projects. Responsible for detailed design based on project direction from Alnylam leads and breaking down efforts to assign to individual developers including confirming their results. Will also assist support escalations as needed. Expertise Areas: Databricks (Required) PowerBI (Required) ETL methodologies (e.g. Boomi) Data Lakehouse concepts Data engineering, include SQL and/or Python Data and analytics design Dev lead for junior developers/support Jira experience Experience in G&A data domains, such as finance, HR, compliance, etc. (nice to have) Thanks & Regards...Venki R7326594937 (D)7327775185 -121 (EXT) Senior Executive (Staffing) Nam Info Inc Email : Venki@nam-it.com Website - www.nam-it.com 2525 US Highway 130, Building D, Suite 2-Cranbury, NJ-08512
